summary: Pennywise: A platform where brands are listed and clients can contact virtual assistant providers, who are listed/ranked according to payment per client
architectural_notes: Multi-role system: brands, clients, and virtual assistant providers
Payment-based ranking system for virtual assistant providers

existing_features.title: Create a frontend page that displays a list of all Brands with their name, description, and logo
Create a frontend page that displays Virtual Assistant Providers listed in order of payment per client, showing name, description, payment rate, and contact information
Implement a contact mechanism on the frontend that allows clients to initiate contact with a selected Virtual Assistant Provider

Design a cohesive visual theme with warm, professional colors (avoiding blue and purple), modern typography, and a clean layout that emphasizes trust and professionalism suitable for a business services platform

new_feature_requests.summary: Allow clients to contact virtual assistant providers
List virtual assistant providers sorted by payment per client
Create a backend data model for Brands with fields: id, name, description, and logo URL
Create a backend data model for Virtual Assistant Providers with fields: id, name, description, contact information, and payment per client
Implement backend functionality to add and retrieve the list of Brands
Implement backend functionality to add and retrieve Virtual Assistant Providers sorted by payment per client in descending order
